title: Alicaey the Kitten
subtitle: 2. Help when you can.
story_theme: The little cat (called Alicaey) noticed Atley had injured his leg, she cared for him with first aid and kept him company until he healed.
guidance: soft colors warm tones. sunny forest with trees, flowers. Style is whimsical. Alicaeyis a orange color kitten, Atley is a cub brown bear.
